description.p: You control a gnome, who can walk around a garden, along paths already marked, or create new paths wherever you wish. You also have a ball, which can be thrown in the direction you're facing, towards the gnome's feet. Points are scored for collecting cherries (if you collect eight cherries without stopping or pushing an apple, you get a bonus), killing monsters (by squashing them, or throwing the ball at them), and collecting the prize left when all the monsters have come out of their den.
